channel.title: Homes on Duccio Gamannossi degl'Innocenti
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Duccio Gamannossi degl'Innocenti

item.description: Biography I am an assistant professor at the Department of Economics and Management of the University of Padova. Previously I have been a Postdoctoral Researcher fellow at the Catholic University in Milan and at the University of Exeter. I am a member of the CIFREL (Interuniversity Research Centre on Local and Regional Finance) and an Associate Fellow of the Tax Administration Research Centre of the University of Exeter. My research is focused on Public Economics and entails topics in Taxation and Tax Compliance.

Teaching University of Padua Coding: Introduction to Python Laboratory: Coding Office Hours: Wednesdays, 13:40-15:40 at Dsea, Via del Santo 33 (first office on the left in Levi Cases garden). Please book here to ensure availability. International Honors College, Ca’ Foscari University of Venice Introduction to Coding Office Hours: On request, either by mail or in person
